players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm shocked Alice is gone. We need to be careful and share any suspicions."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. My investigation confirms it. Diana, we must vote together to eliminate him and win this for the town."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso."
